getVoltage¶

Radiation.getVoltage(scope, scattering=None)[source]¶

Returns the sensitivity timeseries for the specified scopte and scattering type.

Mind that when scope==”LW”, then scattering does not need to be provided, because longwave radiation is always measured diffuse. If scattering is provided anyway it will fall back to “diffuse”.

Parameters:
  • scope – One of: “LW”,”SW”. (LW = long wave,, SW = short wave)
  • scattering – One of: “direct”,”diffuse”,”global”
Returns:

1-D numpy array of the voltage.
